text: Pickens, formerly called Pickens Courthouse, is a small town in Pickens County, South Carolina, United States. The population was 3,388 at the 2020 census. It is the county seat of Pickens County. Pickens County is included in Greenville-Mauldin-Easley metropolitan area. ==References== Category:County seats in South Carolina Category:Cities in South Carolina
title: Pickens, South Carolina
